Listen to the song and type your guess!: Listen to the song and type your guess!
Shows instructions on how to vote to rec: Shows instructions on how to vote to receive 2x EXP for an hour.
Almighty Ruler of the Solar System: Almighty Ruler of the Solar System
Views a player profile based on their Di: Views a player profile based on their Discord ID.
View songs added to KMQ in the past two: View songs added to KMQ in the past two weeks.
See the scoreboard for the current game: See the scoreboard for the current game
Vote to skip the current song. A song is: Vote to skip the current song. A song is skipped when majority of participants vote to skip it.
Various actions to save/load game option: Various actions to save/load game option presets. Preset name must be one word long.
Lists all of the server's presets: Lists all of the server's presets
Saves the current game options as a pres: Saves the current game options as a preset
Loads the mentioned preset or preset ide: Loads the mentioned preset or preset identifier ({{exampleIdentifier}}) into the game options
Replace the mentioned preset's options w: Replace the mentioned preset's options with the current game options
Returns a unique identifier that can be: Returns a unique identifier that can be used to load/import the mentioned preset
Creates a new preset with name `preset_n: Creates a new preset with name `preset_name` using an exported preset identifier ({{exampleIdentifier}})
Set a cutoff year range for songs. If on: Set a cutoff year range for songs. If one value is specified, only songs AFTER that year will be played. If two values are specified, only songs BETWEEN those two years will be played
Play songs released after the year {{yea: Play songs released after the year {{year}}.
Play songs released between the years {{: Play songs released between the years {{beginningYear}}-{{endYear}}.
Reset to the default cutoff of {{default: Reset to the default cutoff of {{defaultBeginningSearchYear}} to {{defaultEndSearchYear}}
Sets a maximum length for the KMQ game i: Sets a maximum length for the KMQ game in minutes.
The game will automatically end after {{: The game will automatically end after {{duration}} minutes.
Remove {{duration}} minutes from the cur: Remove {{duration}} minutes from the current game's duration
Add {{duration}} minutes to the current: Add {{duration}} minutes to the current game's duration.
Select as many groups that you would lik: Select as many groups that you would like to ignore, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{groupsLink}})
Starts a game of KMQ. Pick between class: Starts a game of KMQ. Pick between classic (default), elimination mode, and teams mode.
Start a classic game of KMQ (type in you: Start a classic game of KMQ (type in your guess first to get a point)
Start an elimination game of KMQ where e: Start an elimination game of KMQ where each player starts with {{lives}} lives.
Split up into as many teams as you want: Split up into as many teams as you want and see who you can depend on to help you win!
Shows your current EXP modifier, and the: Shows your current EXP modifier, and the list of current bonus EXP artists.
Gives a hint to the currently playing so: Gives a hint to the currently playing song
Displays the currently selected groups f: Displays the currently selected groups for a given game option.
Displays the latest updates to KMQ.
Get help about the game's commands. Add: Get help about the game's commands. Add a command to get information about the specific command.
Shows all available commands and a short: Shows all available commands and a short description
Shows a detailed description for the cut: Shows a detailed description for the cutoff command
Choose whether you'd like to hear from s: Choose whether you'd like to hear from soloists, groups, or both. Options are the following, {{soloists}}, {{groups}}, and {{both}}.
The person that started the game can for: The person that started the game can force-hint the current song, no majority necessary.
The person that started the game can force-skip the current song, no majority necessary.
Choose how to answer: by typing your ans: Choose how to answer: by typing your answer, or via multiple choice. Options are the following, `{{typing}}`, `{{typingtypos}}`, `{{easy}}`, `{{medium}}`, and `{{hard}}`. Playing on multiple choice mode reduces EXP by (0.25x, 0.5x, 0.75x) based on difficulty
Type your answer in the chat to guess: Type your answer in the chat to guess
Type your answer in the chat to guess. S: Type your answer in the chat to guess. Small typos will be marked as correct. 0.8x EXP penalty will be applied.
Click on the button from 4 multiple choi: Click on the button from 4 multiple choice options to guess. 0.25x EXP penalty will be applied.
Click on the button from 6 multiple choi: Click on the button from 6 multiple choice options to guess. 0.5x EXP penalty will be applied.
Click on the button from 8 multiple choi: Click on the button from 8 multiple choice options to guess. 0.75x EXP penalty will be applied.
Adds one or more groups to the current {: Adds one or more groups to the current {{groups}}, {{exclude}}, or {{include}} options
Adds Twice and Red Velvet to the current: Adds Twice and Red Velvet to the current {{groups}} option
Adds BESTie, Dia, and IKON to the curren: Adds BESTie, Dia, and IKON to the current {{exclude}} option
Adds EXO to the current {{include}} opti: Adds EXO to the current {{include}} option
Adds one or more groups to the current {: Adds one or more groups to the current {{{groups}}}, {{exclude}}, or {{include}} options
Adds Twice and Red Velvet to the current: Adds Twice and Red Velvet to the current {{{groups}}} option
Adds BESTie, Dia, and IKON to the curren: Adds BESTie, Dia, and IKON to the current {{{exclude}}} option
Adds EXO to the current {{{include}}} op: Adds EXO to the current {{{include}}} option
Choose whether to automatically include: Choose whether to automatically include a group's subunits, when using {{groups}}
Automatically include subunits. For exam: Automatically include subunits. For example, `{{groups}} BTS` would include songs by BTS, J-Hope, RM, etc.
Reset to the default option of {{default: Reset to the default option of {{defaultSubunit}}
Try your best to guess correctly before: Try your best to guess correctly before the timer runs out! Enter a time in seconds, or give no arguments to disable.
In {{timer}} seconds, if no user has gue: In {{timer}} seconds, if no user has guessed correctly, the round ends and the next one begins automatically
This is an unreleased game option, and c: This is an unreleased game option, and can only be used on the official KMQ server
Hey. This hasn't been announced yet, but: Hey. This hasn't been announced yet, but check out the KMQ server to try it out! Play a special mode with modified audio.
Plays the song at a slow speed: Plays the song at a slow speed
Plays the song at a fast speed: Plays the song at a fast speed
Plays the song at a faster speed: Plays the song at a faster speed
Plays the song at a low pitch: Plays the song at a low pitch
Plays the song at a high pitch: Plays the song at a high pitch
Plays a nightcore edit of the song: Plays a nightcore edit of the song
Choose whether songs are played in truly: Choose whether songs are played in truly random order ({{random}}) or randomly but uniquely until all songs are played ({{shuffle}}).
Every song will play once before any are: Every song will play once before any are repeated.
Reset to the default shuffle mode of {{d: Reset to the default shuffle mode of {{defaultShuffle}}
Choose whether each song is played from: Choose whether each song is played from the beginning, middle, or at a random point
Songs will be played starting from a ran: Songs will be played starting from a random point in the middle
Songs will be played starting from the m: Songs will be played starting from the middle point
Song will be played starting from the ve: Song will be played starting from the very beginning
Reset to the default seek of {{defaultSe: Reset to the default seek of {{defaultSeek}}
Choose whether to include only official: Choose whether to include only official music videos, or all videos (b-sides, dance practices, acoustic versions, remixes, etc.)
Plays all available videos, including da: Plays all available videos, including dance practices, acoustic versions, remixes
Reset to the default release type of {{d: Reset to the default release type of {{defaultRelease}}
Removes one or more groups from the curr: Removes one or more groups from the current {{groups}}, {{exclude}}, or {{include}} options
Removes {{groupOne}} and {{groupTwo}} fr: Removes {{groupOne}} and {{groupTwo}} from the current {{groups}} option
Removes {{groupOne}}, {{groupTwo}}, and: Removes {{groupOne}}, {{groupTwo}}, and {{groupThree}} from the current {{exclude}} option
Reset to the default game options: Reset to the default game options
Resets to the default game options: Resets to the default game options
Choose whether to include OST songs: Choose whether to include OST songs
Reset to the default option of {{default: Reset to the default option of {{defaultOst}}
Are you an artist? Draw some KMQ fan art: Are you an artist? Draw some KMQ fan art to get an exclusive profile badge! Join the [official KMQ server](https://discord.gg/R55g4CRESW) to share!
'Recent' statistics represent data from: 'Recent' statistics represent data from last 24 hours.
Type {{{play}}} in chat and the bot will:
Type {{{play}}} in chat and the bot will play a random kpop song in VC. The goal of this game is to be the first person to guess the song name in chat.
See your current game options with {{{options}}}. Use `{{{help}}} [command]` to get more details about a command.
Adds one or more groups to the current {: Adds one or more groups to the current {{{groups}}}, {{{exclude}}}, or {{{include}}} options
Choose how to answer: by typing your ans: Choose how to answer: by typing your answer, or via multiple choice. Options are the following, `{{{typing}}}`, `{{{typingtypos}}}`, `{{{easy}}}`, `{{{medium}}}`, and `{{{hard}}}`. Playing on multiple choice mode reduces EXP by (0.25x, 0.5x, 0.75x) based on difficulty
Choose whether you'd like to hear from s: Choose whether you'd like to hear from soloists, groups, or both. Options are the following, {{{soloists}}}, {{{groups}}}, and {{{both}}}.
Play songs released after the year {{{ye: Play songs released after the year {{{year}}}.
Play songs released between the years {{: Play songs released between the years {{{beginningYear}}}-{{{endYear}}}.

The game will automatically end after {{: The game will automatically end after {{{duration}}} minutes.
Remove {{{duration}}} minutes from the c: Remove {{{duration}}} minutes from the current game's duration
Add {{{duration}}} minutes to the curren: Add {{{duration}}} minutes to the current game's duration.
Select as many groups that you would lik: Select as many groups that you would like to ignore, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupsLink}}})
Choose the gender of the artists you'd l: Choose the gender of the artists you'd like to hear from. Options are the following, {{{male}}}, {{{female}}}, and {{{coed}}}. Alternatively, use {{{genderAlternating}}} to rotate between {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists every round.
Play songs from both {{{male}}} and {{{f: Play songs from both {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists
Play songs only from {{{coed}}} groups (: Play songs only from {{{coed}}} groups (groups with both male and female members)
Reset to the default genders of {{{male}: Reset to the default genders of {{{male}}}, {{{female}}}, and {{{coed}}}
Alternate between {{{male}}} and {{{fema: Alternate between {{{male}}} and {{{female}}} artists every round
Once the player with the most points rea: Once the player with the most points reaches the goal score, the game ends. Calling it with no arguments disables the goal. If a game is in progress, the goal must exceed the highest score
The first player to {{{goal}}} wins the: The first player to {{{goal}}} wins the game
Select as many groups that you would lik: Select as many groups that you would like to hear from, separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupList}}}).
Choose whether to guess by song title, a: Choose whether to guess by song title, artist name, or both.
Type the correct song name to win a game: Type the correct song name to win a game round
Type the correct name of the artist to w: Type the correct name of the artist to win a game round
Type the correct name of the artist (0.2: Type the correct name of the artist (0.2 points) or the name of the song (1 point) to win a game round
Reset to the default guess mode of {{{de: Reset to the default guess mode of {{{defaultGuessMode}}}
Select as many groups that you would lik: Select as many groups that you would like to forcefully include, ignoring other filters ({{{gender}}}, {{{artisttype}}}, etc), separated by commas. A list of group names can be found [here]({{{groupsLink}}})
Sets Korean-only or all available songs: Sets Korean-only or all available songs
Plays only Korean songs. Ignores songs t: Plays only Korean songs. Ignores songs that are in foreign languages: English, Japanese, Chinese.
Reset to the default language of {{{all}: Reset to the default language of {{{all}}}
Set a maximum number of results in the s: Set a maximum number of results in the song query. This effectively sets the 'Top X number of songs' based on the selected filters.
Plays the top {{{limit}}} most listened: Plays the top {{{limit}}} most listened songs from the currently selected options.
Plays between the {{{limit_1}}} to {{{li: Plays between the {{{limit_1}}} to {{{limit_2}}} most listened songs from the currently selected options.
Reset to the default limit of {{{default: Reset to the default limit of {{{defaultLimit}}}
Sets whether multiple people can guess a: Sets whether multiple people can guess a song correctly. When {{{on}}}, players will have 1.5 seconds after the first correct answer is given, to continue to answer.        The first answer receives full EXP, correct answers that come after receive multiplicatively less EXP.
Allows for a 1.5 second grace period fro: Allows for a 1.5 second grace period from when the first correct guess occurs. Multiple players are able to guess correctly.
Only the first person who guesses correc: Only the first person who guesses correct is awarded the point.
Reset to the default multiguess type of: Reset to the default multiguess type of {{{defaultMultiguess}}}

You can see the daily, weekly, and month: You can see the daily, weekly, and monthly leaderboard with `,leaderboard`. See `,help leaderboard` to learn more.
This user needs to play their first game: This user needs to play their first game before their stats are tracked.
{{{join}}} the game and start it with {{: {{{join}}} the game and start it with {{{begin}}}!
Type {{{join}}} to play in the upcoming: Type {{{join}}} to play in the upcoming elimination game. Once all have joined, {{{mentionedUser}}} must send {{{begin}}} to start the game. Everyone begins with {{{lives}}} lives.
You can set which groups you want to exc: You can set which groups you want to exclusively hear songs from using the `groups` game option. See `,help groups` for more details.
